note: Canadian by choice. International in outlook. One foot in #YEG and the other in #Halifax (my legs are apparently very long!): see table below for where I’m living right now. Leftie. Foodie. Queer. Multilingual. Bike person, but a pedestrian at heart. Social scientist by trade (at UAlberta). Household = me, Partner, two cats. Pretty bent by the anti-reality turn our world has taken since early 2022 but not (yet) broken.

fields.name: Languages
fields.value: English, German, and Dutch fluently, decent Italian, some French and Spanish

fields.name: Bikes
fields.value: Two Brompton folding bikes (one acoustic, one electric) and an Optima Hopper semirecumbent (currently stored with friends in the Netherlands)

fields.name: Pronouns
fields.value: Obvious if you interact with me for a while, irrelevant if you don’t know me (if you misgender me in the absence of full disclosure, I will find it interesting rather than annoying, I promise!)
